name: Proof of Vibes
description:
POV is the first DAO contributor guide that allows you to mint and collect your favorite moments on chain. Through confirming levels of quality of events, fashion, music, and culture.  Each time a member mints a POV NFT (Profile) their rating is logged for other members to see.  The more members mint ratings, the more $VIBE tokens they earn.  

Short-term members will be able to make better judgments on what events to go to and what products to buy.  Long term, members will be able to develop a trackable reputation on-chain opening a universe of opportunities and experiences. Proof of Vibe is building Blockchain's very first vibe-to-earn platform. In simple terms, weâ€™re a front-end application built on top of Lens Protocol. Imagine Yelp, Twitter, and Facebook marketplace all had a baby, and that baby read the bitcoin whitepaper. Thats the Proof-of-Vibe.
payDisclosure: Thanks for believing in the vibes
